trigger.match: ^Flames erupt on your skin\, blistering your flesh\.$
trigger.name: aff_ablaze__

trigger.match: ^Your speed defence is destroyed\.$
trigger.name: aff_aeon1__

trigger.match: ^Suddenly your movements through the time stream are slowed\.$
trigger.name: aff_aeon2__

trigger.match: ^You close your eyes\, curl up in a ball\, and fall asleep\.$
trigger.name: aff_asleep_fell__

trigger.match: ^You feel incredibly tired\, and fall asleep immediately\.$
trigger.name: aff_asleep_poison__

trigger.match: ^Your exhausted mind can stay awake no longer\, and you fall into a deep sleep\.$
trigger.name: aff_asleep_tired__

trigger.match: ^You bleed (\d+) health\.$
trigger.name: aff_bleeding__

trigger.match: ^Your flesh is charred\, and you receive (first|second|third|fourth) degree burns\.$
trigger.name: aff_burnlevel__

trigger.match: ^You plummet head first into the ground with a sickening crunch\.$
trigger.name: aff_concussion__

trigger.match: ^A wave of dizziness suddenly overwhelms you\.$
trigger.name: aff_dizziness__

trigger.match: ^\| Sobriety \: (.+?)\s+Credits \: \d+\s+\|$
trigger.name: aff_drunk__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) points .+? at you\, and sparks fly out of it\.$
trigger.name: aff_enchantment__

trigger.match: ^Sticky strands of webbing spray out (?:from ([A-Z][a-z]+) )?to cover you\.$
trigger.name: aff_entangled__

trigger.match: ^Unthinking terror seizes your mind as ([A-Z][a-z]+) looms up before you\, [hH](?:is|er) visage nightmarish and impossibly powerful\.$
trigger.name: aff_fear_ascendant__

trigger.match: ^You can hold your breath no longer and gasp for air, fighting to bring oxygen back to your deprived muscles\.$
trigger.name: aff_hyperventilating__

trigger.match: ^Your cracked (left|right) kneecap shatters\, sending a fracture spiralling up your leg\.$
trigger.name: aff_kneecap_again__

trigger.match: ^You (?:drop to one knee\, demonstrating your humility and respect|kneel before [A-Z][a-z]+\, swearing your allegiance to [hH](?:im|er))\.$
trigger.name: aff_kneeling__

trigger.match: ^You cry out in pain as your (left|right) leg twists and snaps beneath you\.$
trigger.name: aff_legs_notree__

trigger.match: ^You scream as you feel the force of the landing break both your legs\.$
trigger.name: aff_legs_tree__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+)\'s face reddens until\, abruptly\, (?:[hH]|[sS]h)e belches out a cone of scorching flames at you\.$
trigger.name: aff_orgpotion_gaudiguch__

trigger.match: ^Thin tendrils of shadow reach out from ([A-Z][a-z]+) to rake across your skin\.$
trigger.name: aff_orgpotion_glomdoring__

trigger.match: ^A rush of icy air leaves ([A-Z][a-z]+)\'s pores and surrounds you in a frigid cloud\, turning your potions to slush\.$
trigger.name: aff_orgpotion_hallifax__

trigger.match: ^The slushy potions chill your tongue and torment your brain with a sudden and agonising chill\.$
trigger.name: aff_orgpotion_hallifax_stun__

trigger.match: ^Your slushy potions warm and return to their normal consistency\.$
trigger.name: aff_orgpotion_hallifax_end__

trigger.match: ^Darkness swells from ([A-Z][a-z]+) and strikes at you\.$
trigger.name: aff_orgpotion_magnagora__

trigger.match: ^(?:A sense of deep inner calm descends on you|You are feeling far too tranquil to attempt such a violent act)\.$
trigger.name: aff_pacifism__

trigger.match: ^(?:You sit yourself down|You stumble and fall in your alcoholic haze|You slip and fall in the puddle of puke as you try to leave|You must (?:first raise yourself from the floor and stand up|pick yourself off the ground first|first stand up before you can do that))\.$
trigger.name: aff_prone__

trigger.match: ^You manage to resist the attempt to summon you\.$
trigger.name: aff_resist_summon__

trigger.match: ^Your muscles spasm and start to lock up\.$
trigger.name: aff_rigormortis__

trigger.match: ^An uncomfortable itch tickles you in an embarrassing location\.$
trigger.name: aff_scabies__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) (?:swings|follows through by swinging) .+? with all [hH](?:is|er) might\, smashing it into your head with a resounding ring\.$
trigger.name: aff_shieldstun__

trigger.match: ^.+? unleashes a bolt of energy that slams into you\.$
trigger.name: aff_totem_statue__

trigger.match: ^The (\w+) rune on your amulet shines bright blue\, protecting you\.$
trigger.name: repel_amulet__

trigger.match: ^The courage of the wolf swells within you\, driving fear from your heart\.$
trigger.name: repel_fear__

trigger.match: ^Your (ceremonially )?enhanced (insight|movement|passion|vivaciousness) repels (\w+)\.$
trigger.name: repel_tea__

trigger.match: ^The karmic blessing of (?:death|chaos) protects you from (\w+)\.$
trigger.name: repel_karma__

trigger.match: ^Flames lick around you \- you are on fire\!$
trigger.name: symp_ablaze__

trigger.match: ^You move sluggishly into action\.$
trigger.name: symp_aeon__

trigger.match: ^Terror descends upon you and your head swims \- you must find shelter\!$
trigger.name: symp_agoraphobia__

trigger.match: ^Your mind swirls in a fog as you try to remember what you were doing a moment ago\.$
trigger.name: symp_amnesia__

trigger.match: ^(?:The idea of putting something in your stomach sickens you|The thought of eating sickens you)\.$
trigger.name: symp_anorexia__

trigger.match: ^Your (left|right) arm must be free\.$
trigger.name: symp_arm_not_free__

trigger.match: ^Your (left|right) arm is off balance\.$
trigger.name: symp_arm_off_balance__

trigger.match: ^You are asleep and can do nothing\. WAKE will attempt to wake you\.$
trigger.name: symp_asleep__

trigger.match: ^Your lungs are much too constricted to smoke\.$
trigger.name: symp_asthma_smoking__

trigger.match: ^You cough uncontrollably\, as you hack up some black phlegm\.$
trigger.name: symp_black_lung__

trigger.match: ^You attempt to inhale\, but only end up coughing out more black phlegm\.$
trigger.name: symp_black_lung_smoke__

trigger.match: ^You suffer acute pain as you (?:chew|swallow)\.$
trigger.name: symp_broken_jaw__

trigger.match: ^The walls close in to suffocate you \- you must escape\!$
trigger.name: symp_claustrophobia__

trigger.match: ^You lash out clumsily\.$
trigger.name: symp_clumsiness__

trigger.match: ^Experiencing a shortness of breath\, you suddenly black out\.$
trigger.name: symp_collapsed_lungs__

trigger.match: ^You are unable to smoke due to collapsed lungs\.$
trigger.name: symp_collapsed_lungs_smoking__

trigger.match: ^You are too confused to concentrate properly\.$
trigger.name: symp_confused__

trigger.match: ^Both your arms must be free and functioning to do that\.$
trigger.name: symp_crippled_arms__

trigger.match: ^You cannot move as both your legs are crippled\.$
trigger.name: symp_crippled_legs__

trigger.match: ^Blood begins to slowly drip from your nose\.$
trigger.name: symp_crotamine1__

trigger.match: ^You cough suddenly\, expelling black fluid with bits of what looks to be tissue suspended in it\.$
trigger.name: symp_crotamine2__

trigger.match: ^Your legs tremble slightly as a yellow jaundice begins to creep through your now\-pale features\.$
trigger.name: symp_crotamine3__

trigger.match: ^The dark void of terror fills your mind as\, horribly\, blood begins to seep out of every pore on your body\.$
trigger.name: symp_crotamine4__

trigger.match: ^Your crushed windpipe inhibits your ability to swallow\.$
trigger.name: symp_crushed_pipe__

trigger.match: ^You are too caught up in your dark fate to focus your mind\.$
trigger.name: symp_darkfate_focus__

trigger.match: ^The herb tastes foul and spoiled as you muse on your dark fate\.$
trigger.name: symp_darkfate_herb__

trigger.match: ^The ground seems to tilt and you fall with a thump\.$
trigger.name: symp_dizziness__

trigger.match: ^Your bowels turn to water and are voided as you double over from a sharp pain in your stomach\.$
trigger.name: symp_dysentery__

trigger.match: ^Tight bindings (?:cling to you\, making that impossible|prevent you from moving)\.$
trigger.name: symp_entangled__

trigger.match: ^Your limbs begin to jerk and shake uncontrollably\, and you begin to foam at the mouth\.$
trigger.name: symp_epilepsy__

trigger.match: ^You rush about in a state of utter panic\.$
trigger.name: symp_fear__

trigger.match: ^You find that you are not yet ready to perform that feat\.$
trigger.name: symp_feat_failed__

trigger.match: ^You begin moving your frozen body slowly \w+\.$
trigger.name: symp_frozen__

trigger.match: ^A sheet of blood rolls down your forehead and into your eyes\.$
trigger.name: symp_furrowed_brow__

trigger.match: ^You immediately throw up what you just ate\.$
trigger.name: symp_gluttony__

trigger.match: ^(?:Spiders are erupting from your mouth and nose\!|Ooh look\! A lovely lake\. Perhaps you\'ll dive in\!)$
trigger.name: symp_hallucinations__

trigger.match: ^You leap up and attempt a graceful swan dive\.\.\.right into the solid ground\.$
trigger.name: symp_hallucinations_prone__

trigger.match: ^You are stunned by (?:a vision of divine astral beings|the sight of a massive pink bunny hopping by)\.$
trigger.name: symp_hallucinations_stun__

trigger.match: ^You watch helplessly as your lifeforce drains into [A-Z][a-z]+\.$
trigger.name: symp_healthleech__

trigger.match: ^You attempt to move\, but the muscles of your legs do not respond\.$
trigger.name: symp_hemiplegy_legs__

trigger.match: ^Your blood refuses to clot\.$
trigger.name: symp_hemophilia__

trigger.match: ^You slowly hobble \w+\.$
trigger.name: symp_hobbling__

trigger.match: ^Your hypersomnia prevents your insomnia\.$
trigger.name: symp_hypersomnia__

trigger.match: ^Your mind swims as dizziness overtakes you\.$
trigger.name: symp_hypochondria1__

trigger.match: ^(?:You feel incredibly tired\, and fall asleep immediately|A prickly stinging overcomes your body\, fading away into numbness)\.$
trigger.name: symp_hypochondria2__

trigger.match: ^You blink for a moment\, then instantly\, all about you is darkness\.$
trigger.name: symp_hypochondria3__

trigger.match: ^(?:A sense of extreme nausea washes over you\.|You stumble as your (?:left|right) leg shrivels into a useless appendage\.|You watch\, in horror as your (?:left|right) arm shrivels up and becomes useless\.|You feel control over your power begin to slip away\.|Your vision is flooded with light\, and your face suddenly reddens\.|Unreasoning rage turns the world blood\-red\.|None may stand in your way\! You are invincible\!|You begin feeling slightly flushed\.|Your limbs grow heavy and you groan feebly\.|You gasp as your fine\-tuned reflexes disappear into a haze of confusion|You notice that your sweat glands have begun to rapidly secrete a foul\, oily substance\.|Hmmmm\. Why must everything be so difficult to figure out\?|You reali[sz]e that your heroic actions can no longer continue unnoticed\, and you take it upon yourself to rectify the situation\.|You look about yourself nervously\.|The idea of eating or drinking is repulsive to you\.|You feel a tightening sensation grow in your lungs\.)$
trigger.name: symp_hypochondria4__

trigger.match: ^You are too impatient to focus on anything\.$
trigger.name: symp_impatience__

trigger.match: ^You cannot be bothered to do that\, it is too boring\.$
trigger.name: symp_impatience_med__

trigger.match: ^Justice is dealt out and your attack rebounds onto you\.$
trigger.name: symp_justice__

trigger.match: ^You are unable to maintain a stance for any period of time while your kneecaps are cracked\.$
trigger.name: symp_kneecap_stance__

trigger.match: ^(?:You are unable to (?:stand|spring up) with your legs locked|You attempt to move\, but the muscles of your legs are locked)\.$
trigger.name: symp_leglocked__

trigger.match: ^You realise that you have been left alone \- you must find companionship\!$
trigger.name: symp_loneliness__

trigger.match: ^Blood flows into your (left|right) side inner ear\, inhibiting your sense of balance\.$
trigger.name: symp_lost_ear__

trigger.match: ^Your empty eyesockets can see nothing but the oblivion of utter darkness\.$
trigger.name: symp_lost_eyes__

trigger.match: ^You love [A-Z][a-z]+ far too much to even THINK of hurting [hH](?:im|er)\.$
trigger.name: symp_lovers__

trigger.match: ^(?:You smile with pleasure as you ram your fist into your jaw|You drive a clenched fist into your gut|With the heel of your palm\, you smack yourself upside the head|You use your (?:left|right) foot to stomp on your (?:left|right) as hard as possible)\.$
trigger.name: symp_masochism__

trigger.match: ^You feel just as tired as before\.$
trigger.name: symp_narcolepsy__

trigger.match: ^(?:You must have two good legs to do that|Both of your legs are crippled and thus you cannot carry out that action)\.$
trigger.name: symp_need_two_legs__

trigger.match: ^(?:Frustratingly\, your body won\'t respond to your call to action|Paralysed as you are .+?|Your state of paralysis prevents you from doing that|As you are paralysed\, you cannot give away anything|You are paralysed and (?:cannot do that|unable to do that|are unable to drop anything))\.$
trigger.name: symp_paralysis__

trigger.match: ^(?:An ally is just someone pretending to like you\, to make all the sweeter when they stab you in the back\! Allies are for weaklings \- you have no allies\!|Everyone is\, of course\, an enemy, but these people really sicken you\:)$
trigger.name: symp_paranoia__

trigger.match: ^Hatred burns in your eyes \- you realise that your enemies are everywhere\!
trigger.name: symp_paranoia2__

trigger.match: ^Your heart is filled with divine love\, violence is abhorrent to you\.$
trigger.name: symp_peace__

trigger.match: ^You attempt to inhale\, but only end up making a wheezing noise\.$
trigger.name: symp_phrenic_nerve__

trigger.match: ^You attempt to stand up\, but your pierced leg gives out and you collapse back to the ground\.$
trigger.name: symp_pierced_leg__

trigger.match: ^You gasp and shiver as you feel yourself losing control of your own power\.$
trigger.name: symp_powersap__

trigger.match: ^(?:Ugly sores break open up\s?on your skin\, seeping with a bloody\,? yellow muco?us|You feel nauseous and your skin turns blotchy)\.$
trigger.name: symp_pox__

trigger.match: ^Gasping for air\, you faint from sudden exhaustion\.$
trigger.name: symp_punctured_chest__

trigger.match: ^You swoon as you suffer a toxic relapse\.$
trigger.name: symp_relapsing__

trigger.match: ^You stand in such dishonour that not even your loyal friends will help you\.$
trigger.name: symp_repugnance__

trigger.match: ^Your (left|right) (arm|leg) suddenly stiffens and loses all feeling sensation\, rendering it useless\.$
trigger.name: symp_rigormortis__

trigger.match: ^Red rivulets of blood flow down your (left|right) (arm|leg)\.$
trigger.name: symp_rivulets__

trigger.match: ^You are too tangled up to do that\.$
trigger.name: symp_roped__

trigger.match: ^A sudden itch drives you half\-mad\, and you scratch it furiously\.$
trigger.name: symp_scabies__

trigger.match: ^Something is blocking your throat\, making it impossible to swallow\.$
trigger.name: symp_scarab__

trigger.match: ^You have no arms\!$
trigger.name: symp_severed_arms__

trigger.match: ^(?:You are bound and cannot move|You are shackled and cannot do that)\.$
trigger.name: symp_shackled__

trigger.match: ^You feel the strength ebb from your body as the cold takes its toll\.$
trigger.name: symp_shivering__

trigger.match: ^You have a particularly intense shiver\.$
trigger.name: symp_shivering_disrupted__

trigger.match: ^Heart thumping\, you cannot bear the company of others and depart in terror\.$
trigger.name: symp_shyness__

trigger.match: ^A blush begins to creep up your neck and into your face as you come to the reali[sz]ation that there are other people here\!$
trigger.name: symp_shyness_fear__

trigger.match: ^A copious amount of blood suddenly splutters from your gut onto the ground\, and you slip in the deep red puddle\.$
trigger.name: symp_sliced_gut__

trigger.match: ^Copious amounts of blood suddenly splutter from your (chest|gut) onto the ground\.$
trigger.name: symp_sliced_torso__

trigger.match: ^The arnica slides off your oily skin\.$
trigger.name: symp_slickness_arnica__

trigger.match: ^The potion slides off your oily skin\.$
trigger.name: symp_slickness_health__

trigger.match: ^The salve slides off your oily skin\.$
trigger.name: symp_slickness_salve__

trigger.match: ^The hole in your throat prevents you from swallowing\.$
trigger.name: symp_slit_throat__

trigger.match: ^You stumble and lose your combat stance\.$
trigger.name: symp_stance_stumble__

trigger.match: ^You are too stunned to be able to do anything\.$
trigger.name: symp_stunned__

trigger.match: ^You yell\, \"(?:I like cheese|[A-Z][a-z]+ (?:smells like a goat|is cute))\!\"$
trigger.name: symp_stupidity__

trigger.match: ^Sunlight shines down upon you mercilessly\, rippling across your skin like fire\.$
trigger.name: symp_sunallergy__

trigger.match: ^The sun has rendered you too weak to move a muscle\.$
trigger.name: symp_sunallergy_paralysis__

trigger.match: ^Your throat has been locked\, and thus you cannot swallow\.$
trigger.name: symp_throat_locked__

trigger.match: ^You are transfixed and cannot (?:do that\. You must writhe to escape|move)\.$
trigger.name: symp_transfixed__

trigger.match: ^You are overcome by it all and topple over in a dead faint\.$
trigger.name: symp_vapors__

trigger.match: ^(?:You are gripped with fear \- you cannot leave the ground|You look downwards and the ground spins dizzily beneath you)\.$
trigger.name: symp_vertigo__

trigger.match: ^You are too afraid of heights to climb up\.$
trigger.name: symp_vertigo_climb__

trigger.match: ^(?:You begin to panic as the thought of wearing clothing strangles you|You are being strangled by .+? and rip it off of your body(?:\, throwing it on the ground)?)\.$
trigger.name: symp_vestiphobia__

trigger.match: ^You cannot contain the convulsions in your stomach any longer and double over\, retching violently\.$
trigger.name: symp_vomiting__

trigger.match: ^You lurch forward and vomit out a puddle of blood\.$
trigger.name: symp_vomiting_blood__

trigger.match: ^You try to raise the strength in your limbs\, but find yourself too weary\.$
trigger.name: symp_weakness__
